data.text: @AnOpenSecret Justin Timberlake has turned out to be a clown
@AnOpenSecret I meant Timberlake and his praise for Allen... Yuck.

@AnOpenSecret Apparently he’s not as wholesome as he appears. Just read some gossip blinds over at @entylawyer (a very credible source of Hollywood blinds and reveals). He joins causes just for attention!
@isabelgonzalo @AnOpenSecret Because it's famous people's bodyguards shooting up schools and movie theaters, and actors are doing more damage to the planet than huge corporations...

@AnOpenSecret What was Timberlake's misdeed? He took a job connected to a controversal figure. That's not a misdeed that's a business decision. If you don't like Woody Allen,  don't watch his movies, but also don't shame people want to work with him. You lose the moral high ground.
@octopodashuffle The problem is hypocrisy. Don't star in a current Woody Allen film, then use the legitimate #TimesUp movement as a shield for your misdeed.

@AnOpenSecret Very good work indeed. However, it seems you would rather target people around a problem rather than the problem itself. If Timberlake had not worn a pin or black, would you have made the post? You're goal is admirable but your method....
@octopodashuffle We simply call out obvious Hollywood hypocrisy on these issues, as Hollywood does nothing to systematically address its severe child sex abuse problem. Thank you for your comment.

@AnOpenSecret If you want people to agree with you apeal their logic and empathy.
If you demand people agree with you, prepare to become what you hate.
@AnOpenSecret @AngelinaT18
@AnOpenSecret Gawd.. what a joke!!
@AnOpenSecret Didn’t Woody Allen date/marry his underage adopted daughter??   #Cesspool
@AnOpenSecret @Cernovich Huh.
@AnOpenSecret Hypocrite @jtimberlake
@TrumpGirlStrong @AnOpenSecret Adopted stepdaughter.  Still weird.
@TrumpGirlStrong Easy to get lost in a few hours on our Twitter feed with so much #Pedowood news today https://t.co/GVUp536MwZ
@TrumpGirlStrong We'd love to get your thoughts on our Fox Business Hollywood hypocrisy interview this morning?
@TrumpGirlStrong @AnOpenSecret That's why he always had an adolescent or teen girl in many ofhis movies. Pervert indeed 😠👹
@TrumpGirlStrong Honored to be followed as a source of your #Pedowood information!  Thank you for helping spread the word!
@TrumpGirlStrong @AnOpenSecret  https://t.co/8zkpKqyOC3
@AnOpenSecret another  asswhole hippocret
@AnOpenSecret @PollyRendall What law is being broken?

@AnOpenSecret @PollyRendall Isn't it amusing how on one hand everyone believes Rose, Annabella, Asia, etc. about Weinstein but no one believes Dylan about Woody?  Do you believe Bette Midler about Geraldo?  Do you believe Selma Blair about James Tobeck? You can't look the other way because you like Allen.

@PollyRendall @AnOpenSecret He probably wasn't charged cuz the statute of limitations ran out, and if her claims were untrue, or 'libel,' he could sue, seeing as she's made the claims numerous times online - knowing that, I doubt she'd make false claims.
@PollyRendall @AnOpenSecret Love is love...  And morals are morals.

@PollyRendall We do not believe an 18 year old girl who lived the first 8 years of her life as an orphan in squalor in a 3rd world country, who was emotionally behind her years at the time, is capable of proper consent with her step-father. The above is all documented in the public domain.
@AnOpenSecret Another loser.

@PollyRendall Have you read the Washington Post article we cited a couple days ago?  Pretty detailed. Also, what Woody Allen did with his adopted step-daughter was shameful, doesn't have to be illegal to mean he shouldn't be a feted director in Hollywood anymore.

@AnOpenSecret When the lid blows on this Hollywood sexual predator, nobody will have known anything again and everyone will wear stupid pins with stupid slogans to stupid award shows. Then proceed as usual with their depravity. https://t.co/E9WHT0PHEg
@AnOpenSecret https://t.co/Ka5BdMx1Be
@AnOpenSecret hypocrite

@Ispeer75 @Mamie_MAGA @AnOpenSecret @Cernovich And if you can believe one of their children's abuse claims against the parent why would you discredit the others? Dylan has been very public about the abuse she experienced.

@AnOpenSecret @iowa_trump Lol @jtimberlake is a hypocritical pathetic fool working with a pedophile

@FortuneOfFable @markcrosof Well, even best friends dont agree 100% of the time on everything.  We believe it is quite hypocritical for a male actor starring in a Woody Allen film still playing in theaters now to wear a #TIMESUP pin in support of women.
